shortdesc.ph: Configuration for last mile network probe.

plentry.pd:
Whether to probe the uplink network. Some users, such as audience members in a live broadcast channel, do not need to perform network probing:
: Probe the uplink network.
: Do not probe the uplink network.

Whether to probe the downlink network:
: Probe the downlink network.
: Do not probe the downlink network.
The expected maximum uplink bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000, 5000000]. It is recommended to set this value based on the bitrate value in .
The expected maximum downlink bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000, 5000000].

Whether to probe the uplink network. Some users, such as audience members in a live broadcast channel, do not need network probing:
: Probe uplink network.
: Do not probe uplink network.

Whether to probe the downlink network:
: Probe downlink network.
: Do not probe downlink network.
Expected maximum sending bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000,5000000]. It is recommended to refer to the bitrate value in when setting this parameter.
Expected maximum receiving bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000,5000000].

Whether to probe the uplink network. Some users, such as audience members in a live broadcast channel, do not need network probing:
: Probe the uplink network.
: Do not probe the uplink network.

Whether to probe the downlink network:
: Probe the downlink network.
: Do not probe the downlink network.
Expected maximum uplink bitrate in bps. Range: [100000,5000000]. It is recommended to refer to the bitrate value in when setting this parameter.
Expected maximum downlink bitrate in bps. Range: [100000,5000000].

Whether to probe the uplink network. Some users, such as audience members in a live broadcast channel, do not need network probing:
: Probe the uplink network.
: Do not probe the uplink network.

Whether to probe the downlink network:
: Probe the downlink network.
: Do not probe the downlink network.
The expected maximum uplink bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000, 5000000]. It is recommended to refer to the bitrate values in when setting this parameter.
The expected maximum downlink bitrate in bps, ranging from [100000, 5000000].
